En la actualidad cuenta con un negocio D. plásticos, además tiene un restaurante, por lo que se levanta muy temprano para ir al mercado y comprar sus insumos que le servirán para la preparación D. sus comidas para la venta, la cual lo realiza por las tardes.

Con el préstamo D. S/ 2,000 soles, el cual pagará en 5 meses, invertirá en la ampliación D. un restaurante, además comprará utensilios D. plástico para surtir su negocio.

Norita se siente muy tranquila, su negocio tiene cada día mas clientela por lo delicioso D. su sazón y está muy agradecida al apoyo que le brinda Manuela Ramos.

loans.use: Invest in expanding her restaurant and buying plastic goods for her other business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buy repair parts and tools

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Mrs. Olga is part of the Second Friends Communal Bank, located at AA HH Sagrado Corazon de Jesus, Mz  G Lt, 2, in the Calleria District, in Ucayali.  She is 42 years old and has two children, although only one is dependant on her. She is married and her husband is a mechanic.  With the first loan that she recieved from Manuel Ramos, of 300 soles, she decided to invest in purchase and sales of second hand goods. 
Currently, she is committed to the sales and repairs of all types of goods. She gets up early in the morning to do her work around the house, and at the same time, she and her husband run their business. 
With a loan ot 2500 soles, which will be repaid in 5 months, she plans to invest in the purchase of second hand goods, like radios, televisions, irons, etc... 
Olga is very calm and hs likes working with Manuela Ramos, as she feels that her needs are understood and a great help is provided to her family. 

La señora Olga pertenece al Banco Comunal De La Amistad 2, ubicado en el AA. HH. Sagrado Corazón de Jesús Mz. G Lt. 2, distrito de Calleria, departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 42 años, es madre de 2 hijos, uno aún depende de ella, es casada  y su esposo es mecánico. Con el primer préstamo que recibió de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300 soles decide invertir en la compra y venta de artefactos de segunda. 

En la actualidad se dedica a la venta y reparación de todo tipo de artefactos. Se levanta muy temprano para dedicarse a las labores del hogar y simultáneamente ella y su esposo atiende en el negocio.

Con el préstamo de S/ 2,500 soles, el cual pagará en 5 meses, invertirá en la compra de artefactos de segunda, como radios, televisores, planchas, etc.

Olga se siente muy tranquila, le gusta trabajar con Manuela Ramos  porque siente que le entienden sus necesidades y es un gran apoyo para ella y su familia.

loans.use:
Purchase of used electrical goods
Compra de artefactos eléctricos de segunda mano

loans.name: Rogelia Mercedes

texts.es:
Mrs Rogelia is part of the Women's Communal Solidarity Bank, located at Jr.  Inmaculada N° 169, Calleria District, Ucayali. She is 57 years old and has three children, all of whom are independent. She is married a dn her husband manages a chicken coop/farm.  With her first loan of 300 soles  that she received from Manuela Ramos, she invested it to purchase food stapes to make typical food. 
Currently, she has a regional typical food restaurant. She wakes up early in the morning to go to the market and buy the goods required to prepare her dishes.  At night, Rogelia sells her food and has a good client base that enjoy her food. 
With a 2500 soles loan, which she will repay in 5 months, she will invest in buying salted meat, sausage, plantains, fish and will supplement the needs for the chicken farm. 

Rogelia is healthy and is a hard worker. Thanks to her hard work and merit, she has managed her family and business. She is very appreciative of the support of Manuela Ramos.

loans.use: Purchase of basic goods to prepare food and the implementation of a chicken coop.

loans.name: Rosa Lily

texts.es:
Mrs. Rosa Lily belongs to the Women's Communal Bank, located at Jr. Ricardo Palma No. 225, in the Calleria District, Ucayali, Peru.  She is 62 years old and is the mother of four children, all of whom are independent. She is married and her husband is a mason.  With her first loan of 300 soles, she decided to invest in a used clothing and shoe business. 
Currently, she sells clothes, shoes and other clothing accessories.  She wakes up very early in the morning to search for her goods and afterwards travels to different areas where there is big demand. 

With the loan of 1000 Soles, which will be paid back in 5 months, she will invest in the purchas of clothes such as polos shirts, pants, jackes and shoes, etc... 

Rosa Lily doesn't believe says that she has been lucky with her clothing sales, such that the there has been increased demand since she started working with Manuela Ramos.

loans.use: Purchase of clothing and shoes

loans.name: Rosita

texts.es:
Mrs. Rosita U. is a member of the “Mujeres Solidarias” microfinance institution, located in Jr. Cesar Calvo de Araujo N° 946, in the Calleria district of the department of Ucayali. She is a 50-year-old married mother of 2 underage children. Her husband is a bricklayer. She invested the first loan of S/. 300 soles that she received from Manuela Ramos in purchasing beauty products.

She still sells beauty products. She gets up very early in the morning in order to complete her household chores, then goes out to sell her beauty products in the evening.

She will invest the loan of S/. 1,000 soles, which she will repay in 5 months, in the purchase of beauty products like lipsticks, eye shadows, facial creams, lip liners, cologne, perfume, etc.

Rosita says that everything is going well for her. She feels that her life has changed since she started working with Manuela Ramos because she has become more independent and because she can support her family financially.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Rosita pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Solidarias, ubicado en Jr. Cesar Calvo de Araujo N° 946, distrito de Calleria, departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 50 años, es madre de 2 hijos, todos menores de edad, es casada y su esposo es albañil. Con el primer préstamo que recibió de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300 soles, decide invertir en la compra y venta de productos de belleza.

En la actualidad continúa con la venta de productos de belleza. Se levanta muy temprano para dedicarse a las labores del hogar y por las tardes sale a vender sus productos de belleza.

Con el préstamo de S/ 1,000 soles, el cual pagará en 5 meses, invertirá en la compra de productos de belleza como labiales, sombras, cremas, delineadores, colonias, perfumes, etc.

Rosita nos dice que todo le va bien, siente que su vida ha cambiado desde que empezó a trabajar con Manuela Ramos porque se ha vuelto mas independiente y puede apoyar económicamente a su familia.

loans.use: Purchase of beauty products

loans.name: Rossana

texts.es:
Mrs. Rossana belongs to the San Fernando 2 Communal Bank, located on Km. 6,300 of the Francisco Basadre highway in Calleria district, Ucayali department. She is 33 years of age, she is the mother of 2 minor children, and she is married to a taxi driver. With the first loan of 300 soles (approx. 100 US dollars) she received from Manuela Ramos, she made an investment in groceries to supply her sale business of sodas and snacks.

She now owns a warehouse. She gets up very early to make breakfast for her children and her husband, after which she dedicates her time to tending her warehouse as well as complete her house chores.

With the loan of 1,300 soles (approx. 450 US dollars), which will be paid in 5 months, she will invest in purchasing more groceries such as sodas, a sack of rice, a sack of sugar, snacks, a box of soap, etc.

Rossana feels very happy and says that the loans Manuela Ramos provides is another support for the economy of her family; this makes her feel good about herself because her business grows each day.

Translated to English by Patricia Yáñez, Kiva volunteer.

La señora Rossana pertenece al Banco Comunal San Fernando 2, ubicado en el Km. 6,300 de la carretera Fco. Basadre, distrito de Calleria, departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 33 años, es madre de 2 hijos menores de edad, es casada y su esposo es chofer de taxi. Con el primer préstamo que recibió de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300 soles decide invertir en la venta de gaseosas y golosinas.

En la actualidad tiene una bodega. Se levanta muy temprano para preparar el desayuno de sus hijos y el de su esposo, luego se dedica a la atención de su bodega que comparte con las labores domésticas.

Con el préstamo de S/ 1,300 soles, el cual pagará en 5 meses, invertirá en la compra de gaseosas, 1 saco de arroz, 1 saco de azúcar, golosinas, 1 caja de jabón, etc.

Rossana se siente muy contenta y dice que los préstamos que brinda Manuela Ramos es un apoyo más para la economía de su familia y eso la hace sentir muy bien con ella misma porque su negocio crece cada día más.

loans.use: Purchase of groceries (rice, sugar, snacks, sweets, soap, etc).

loans.name: Sandra Raquel

texts.es:
Mrs. Sandra belongs to the Mujeres del 2000 Communal Bank located on Jr. Unión Mz. M Lt. 3, Yarina Cocha district in the Ucayali department. She is 33 years old; she has 5 minor children, and is married to a mechanic. With the first loan of 300 soles (approx. 100 US dollars) she received from Manuela Ramos, she invested in the purchase of spare parts for motor vehicles.

She is now focused on selling spare parts for motors, for which she must travel constantly, always keeping an eye on her children.

She plans to invest in the purchase of spares for all type of motors with the 1,000 soles loan (approx. 350 US dollar), she hopes to receive.

Sandra feels very good in this business. She likes to be responsible in her payments and has made many friends in her bank. She is very grateful to Manuela Ramos for all the support she has provided.

Translated to English by Patricia Yáñez, Kiva volunteer.

La señora Sandra pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres del 2000, ubicado en Jr. Unión Mz. M Lt. 3, distrito de Yarina Cocha, departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 33 años, es madre de 5 hijos menores de edad, es casada y su esposo es mecánico. Con el primer préstamo que recibió de Manuela Ramos de S/. 300 soles decide invertir en la compra y venta de repuestos de motores.

En la actualidad ella se dedica a la venta de repuestos de motores, para lo cual tiene que viajar constantemente, pero siempre está pendiente de sus hijos.

Con el préstamo de S/ 1,000 soles, el cual pagará en 5 meses, invertirá en la compra de repuestos de motores de todos los tipos.

Sandra se siente muy bien, le gusta ser responsable en sus pagos y ha hecho muchas amigas en su banco y además está muy agradecida a Manuela Ramos por todo el apoyo brindando.

loans.use: Purchase of spare parts for motors

loans.name: Silvia Maria

texts.es:
Mrs. Silvia L. is a member of the “Mujeres del 2000” microfinance institution, located in AA. HH. Maria Parado D. Bellido Mz. C Lt. A. in the Yarina Cocha district of Ucayali. She is a 55-year-old widow with 3 children still under her care. She invested the first loan of S./ 300 soles that she received from Manuela Ramos in opening a small general store.

She still owns the general store, but now it is better stocked. She gets up very early in the morning to both work on her household chores and run her shop throughout the day.

She will invest the loan of S/. 2,300 soles, which she will repay in 5 months, in the purchase of 1 sack of rice, 1 sack of sugar, 1 box of cooking oil, 1 crate of milk, snacks, soft drinks, preserves, etc.

Silvia is very happy because her business is improving, and she is very grateful to Manuela Ramos for its support.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Silvia pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres del 2000, ubicado en el AA. HH. Maria Parado D. Bellido Mz. C Lt. A, distrito D. Yarina Cocha, departamento D. Ucayali. Tiene 55 años y es madre D. 3 hijos, dos aún dependen D. ella, y es viuda. Con el primer préstamo que recibió D. Manuela Ramos D. S/. 300 soles deciD. invertir en una pequeña bodega.

En la actualidad continúa con la bodega, pero ahora es más surtida. Se levanta muy temprano para dedicarse a las labores del hogar y simultáneamente se dedica a la atención D. su bodega durante todo el día.

Con el préstamo D. S/ 2,300 soles, el cual pagará en 5 meses, invertirá en la compra D. 1 saco D. arroz, 1 saco D. azúcar, 1 caja D. aceite, 1 caja D. leche, golosinas, gaseosas, conservas, etc.

Silvia se siente muy contenta porque está mejorando su negocio y está muy agradecida a Manuela Ramos por el apoyo que le brinda.

loans.use: Purchase of groceries (rice, sugar, cooking oil, milk, etc.)

loans.name: Wilber Alexis

texts.es:
At the age of 16, Mr. Wilbur G. started working in automotive repair shops, where he learned his current profession. He has been working in the auto body and paint business for 17 years. He is always working in this activity, which has yielded good results for him because he has been perfecting his skills over the years, turning out an excellent finished product.

His body shop, which he set up himself, is located at his house. He also provides services at his customers’ homes. He works from 6:00am to 6:00pm seven days a week. His job has allowed him to support his family and improve their standard of living. He would like to build a room for his children so that they may have more privacy and comfort.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

Don Wilber a la edad de 16 años empezó a trabajar en talleres de mecánica automotriz y fue ahí donde aprendió a lo que hoy se dedica, lleva 17 años de dedicarse a enderezar y pintar vehículos, actividad a la que le dedica todo el tiempo y la cual le ha generado buenos resultados, ya que con el tiempo se ha ido perfeccionando, trabajando fino y brindando un excelente producto terminado.

En su casa tiene su pequeño taller que él mismo montó, también sale a realizar trabajos a domicilio, trabaja de 6:00 a.m. a 6:00p.m. todos los días de la semana. Su trabajo le ha permitido mantener a su familia y mejorarle la condición de vida de cada uno de sus miembros. El señor desea construir un cuarto para sus hijos en el cual puedan tener mayor independencia y así puedan estar más cómodos.

loans.use: Purchase of cinder blocks, cement, sand, and iron to build a room

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es:
Mrs. Maria Antonia is a widow living in the humble area of Laureles Norte. Her two sons work as machine operators in a free trade zone and live at home with their mom. Thanks to her sons she is able to pay the utilties bills. Maria Antonia has a job as a domestic worker since they could not make ends meet with her son´s income alone.

Their humble home is in a very poor state as they are not able to pay for the necessary repairs. She is requesting a loan to refurbish her bedroom, which was recently damaged by heavy rains and wind.

Translated from Spanish by Henry Corral, Kiva volunteer.<

loans.use: Purchase cement blocks, cement, and a wooden door to refurbish a bedroom

loans.name: Carlos Esteban

texts.es:
Along with his wife, Don Carlos dedicates himself to selling used clothing through a traveling store in the strees of the city, in strategic locations rarely in competition with markets and public squares [plazas]. They have been doing this activity for three years, which has helped them support their two sons and cover house expenses. They do not count on a fixed place from which to offer their goods, this movement is more effective and they are able to sell more rapidly.

Every two weeks they purchase a package of varied clothing which includes pants, shirts, blouses, skirts, shorts. They sell this variety of clothing, styles and sizes by counting on their very accessible/affordable prices. Don Carlos wishes to purchase a package of used shoes, so that their customers have the option of also acquiring products of good quality at low prices. Their customers are people who do not count on sufficient resources to enable them to purchase new products.

Translated from Spanish by Chloé Tuot, a Kiva Volunteer.

Don Carlos junto a su esposa, se dedican a vender ropa usada de manera ambulantes en las calles de la ciudad, lugares estratégicos donde estén mayormente concurridos como los mercados, plazas, llevan tres años en esta actividad la cual les ha ayudado a mantener a sus 2 hijos y mantener los gastos de la casa. No cuentan con un lugar fijo en donde ofrezcan su mercadería, esta forma de moverse es más efectiva, por lo que vende con mayor rapidez. Cada dos semanas compran una paca de ropa variada en donde sacan pantalones, camisas, blusas, faldas, short, una variedad de ropa, estilos y tallas, vende al contado ya que los precios que dan son muy accesibles. El señor desea comprar una paca de zapatos usados, en donde también sus clientes tenga esa opción de adquirir productos de buena calidad a bajos precios, sus clientes son personas que no cuentan con suficientes recursos para adquirir productos nuevos.

loans.use: Purchase a package of used shoes.

loans.name: Agustin Rubio 1 Group

texts.es:
During the week Maria works selling omelets in a local store. This way she earns income to manage her home. Maria is 40 years old and has 5 children. For this reason she must look for work. On Sundays she works in an area in the market where she sells food. She has done this for four years. With the requested loan she would like to purchase merchandise and enlarge her inexpensive little kitchen. The other members of the group are Ana Lidia P. (works selling shoes), Miguelita de Jesus C. (works selling kitchen utensils), and Julia Viviana P. (works selling tacos).

Translated from Spanish by Geoff Rubin, Kiva volunteer

MANERA DE TENER INGRESOS PARA EL HOGAR, DURANTE LA SEMANA SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE TORTILLAS EN UNA LOCAL DE SU COMUNIDAD OBTENIENDO UNA PEQUEÑA REMUNERACION POR SU MARIA TIENE 40 AÑOS, TIENE 5 HIJOS POR LO QUE TIENE QUE BUSCAR LA TRABAJO Y LOS DOMINGOS CUENTA CON UN ESPACIO EN EL MERCADO EN DONDE VENDE COMIDA LO HACE DESDE HACE CUATRO AÑOS, CON EL CREDITO DESEA COMPRAR MERCANCIA Y AGRANDAR SU COCINITA ECONOMICA, LAS OTRAS INTEGRANTES DEL GRUPO SON ANA LIDIA PÉREZ SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE ZAPATOS POR CATALOGO, MIGUELITA DE JESUS C. VENDE UTENCILIOS PARA LA COCINA Y JULIA VIVIANA PÉREZ VENDE TACOS.

loans.use: To purchase cooking utensils and products

loans.name: Fanny 4 Group

texts.es:
Madam Marcelina, as everyone calls her in her town, is 42 years old. When she was very young she learned how to cook and has now worked in the cooking business for 6 years. She runs an inexpensive little kitchen out of her home, from which she obtains income to support her 5 children and purchase cooking products. With the requested loan she would like to buy utensils and merchandise for her business. Madam Marcelina is in a group with four other women: Martha D. sells fruits and vegetables, Derfina Miguelita D. sells tacos and makeup, and Brenda Araceli H. owns a grocery shop, and Ana Laura M. sells clothes.

Translated from Spanish by Geoff Rubin, Kiva volunteer

DOÑA MARCELINA COMO TODOS LA CONOCEN EN SU LOCALIDAD CUENTA CON 42 AÑOS, DESDE MUY PEQUEÑA APRENDIO A COCINAR Y TRABAJO EN ESTE NEGOCIO DESDE HACE 6 AÑOS TIENE UNA COCINA ECONOMICA MUY PEQUEÑA EN SU CASA DE LA QUE OBTIENE GANANCIAS PARA MANTENER A SUS 5 HIJOS Y COMPRAR PRODUCTOS PARA SU NEGOCIO, CON EL CREDITO PRETENDE COMPRAR UTENSILIOS Y MERCANCIA PARA SU NEGOCIO LAS OTRAS INTEGRANTES DEL GRUPO MARTHA D. VENDE FRUTAS Y VERDURAS, DERFINA MIGUELITA D. VENDE TACOS Y COSMENTICOS, BRENDA ARACELI H. TIENE UNA TIENDA DE ABARROTES Y ANA LAURA M. VENDE ROPA.

loans.use: Purchase of cooking utensils and products

loans.name: Francelia 1 Group

texts.es:
Oralia is 48 years old and has three children. For the past three years she has worked selling perfumes and sandals. She distributes this merchandise in the state capital. The income gained from this business is allocated to supporting family expenses and investing in merchandise. With the requested loan Oralia would like to purchase more merchandise and thus spend less on the commute to the city. The other members of her group -- Normayda P. and Yuridia P. -- also work with Oralia. Juanita P. runs a butcher's shop.

Translated from Spanish by Geoff Rubin, Kiva volunteer

ORALIA TIENE 48 AÑOS , TIENE 3 HIJOS, DESDE HACE 3 AÑOS SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE PERFUMES Y DE SANDALIAS MERCANCIA QUE DISTRIBUYE EN LA CAPITAL DEL ESTADO, LAS GANANCIAS LAS DESTINA AL APOYO EN EL GASTO FAMILIAR Y A LA INVERSION DE SU MERCARCIA, CON EL CREDITO QUIERE REALIZAR UNA COMPRA MAYOR DE MERCANCIA Y ASI GASTAR MENOS EN EL TRANSPORTE HACIA LA CIUDAD DE TUXTLA GUTIERREZ LAS OTRAS INTEGRANTES DEL GRUPO NORMAYDA PÉREZ Y YURIDIA PÉREZ SE DEDICAN AL COMERCIO, JUANITA PÉREZ TIENE UNA CARNICERIA.

loans.use: Purchase more merchandise in order to obtain more income

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro works in public transportation driving a taxi. His wife sells supplies and provisions. With their two jobs Pedro and his wife support three children, all of which are in high school or at the state university. Their home is located in Zone 1 of El Alto city.

The requested loan will be used to maintain Pedro's taxi. With proper maintenance, he can continue working and generate income for his family. This is his second credit loan with Impro. This loan was provided to Pedro due to his good record repaying previous loans.

Translated from Spanish by Geoff Rubin, Kiva volunteer

Pedro es chofer de transporte publico, maneja un TAXI. Su esposa es vivandera, ambos cubren la manutención de sus tres hijos (los cuales estudian en el colegio y en la universidad estatal) con dichas actividades. El domicilio de la familia esta ubicado en la Zona 1ro de mayo de la ciudad de El Alto. El crédito será destinado al mantenimiento de su herramienta de trabajo (TAXI), de esa manera continuará trabajando y generando ingresos familiares. Este es su segundo crédito con Impro. El análisis de sus antecedentes lo facultan para otorgarle otro préstamo.

loans.use: Maintenance of taxi

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es:
Emilio and his family decorate leather and woven belts. They also import other mens and womens belt models from Peru. Their sales outlets are located in El Alto (the July 16th trade market) and in La Paz (Tumusla Street). Emilio's wife and oldest son work on marketing the merchandise. The belt business is the main source of income for supporting the family. Emilio lives in El Alto, in the region "Complemento Yunguyo".

The requested loan will be used for the purchase of merchandise. This way Emilio can increase his work capital at his sales locations. This is the second loan borrowed through Kiva. Before Emilio only depended on one sales location. His punctual repayment has enabled him to procure another loan.

Translated from Spanish by Geoff Rubin, Kiva volunteer

Emilio y su familia confeccionan cinturones de cuero e hilo, también importan del Perú otros modelos de cinturones de varones y damas. Sus puestos de venta (2) están ubicados en la Ciudad de El Alto (la feria 16 de julio exactamente) y en la Ciudad de La Paz (calle Tumusla). La esposa y el hijo mayor colaborar en la comercialización de la mercadería, principal fuente de ingresos para la manutención de la familia. Emilio vive en la Zona Complemento Yunguyo de la Ciudad de El Alto. El crédito requerido es para la compra de mercadería, de esa forma incrementará su capital de trabajo en sus puestos de ventas. Es el segundo crédito vía KIVA, anteriormente solo contaba con un puesto de venta; su buen comportamiento de pago lo faculta para aprobarle otro préstamo.

loans.use: Purchase of merchandise

loans.name: Abasolo 1 Group

texts.es:
Rufina is a 52-year-old mother of 5 children who has been running a general store for 10 years. This business is Rufina’s means of supporting her family. She buys her products in the city of Comitan and in Villa las Rosas, which means that her profits are low due to the transportation costs involved. The other members of the group, Maria J. and Asuncion M., sell chicken cut into pieces, while Teresa sells clothing.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

RUFINA TIENE 52 AÑOS, TIENE 5 HIJOS, DESDE HACE 10 AÑOS CUENTA CON UNA TIENDA DE ABARROTES .SU NEGOCIO ES LA MANERA DE SOSTENER A SU FAMILIA, SU MERCANCIA ES COMPRADA EN LA CIUDAD DE COMITAN Y VILLA LAS ROSAS, LA GANANCIA ES POCA DEBIDO A LOS GASTOS QUE GENERA EL TRANSPORTE DE LAS MERCANCIAS, LAS OTRAS INTEGRANTES DEL GRUPO MARIA J. Y ASUNCION M. SE DEDICAN A LA VENTA DE POLLO TROZADO, TERESA G. VENDE ROPA.

loans.use: Purchase more merchandise

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
Lucila works in a Center for orphaned children, realized through the collective activity of volunteers who wish to work together to sustain and maintain the Center, as well as through the sons and brothers, who are working for minimum wage. Her husband works in the center of Bolivia as a construction worker, and is also responsible for the family's earnings and expenses. Lucila's home is in the Zona de Pasankeri in the city of La Paz.

The loan requested in order to purchase a computer, an tool that would help in the education of her two brothers who are studying in the state university.

This is the fourth time that she is askig for a loan from Impro, each previous instance her loan application was approved.

Translated from Spanish by Chloé Tuot, a Kiva Volunteer.

Lucila trabaja en un centro de acogimiento de niños sin familia. Realiza cobranza a voluntarios que quieran colaborar para el sustento de dicho centro, cubre su manutención, así como la de sus dos hijos y dos hermanos con el salario mínimo. Su esposo trabaja en el interior de Bolivia como albañil, también se ocupa de los gastos familiares. El domicilio de Lucila está ubicado en la Zona de Pasankeri de la ciudad de La Paz. El crédito requerido es para la compra de una computadora, instrumento que ayudará en la educación de sus dos hermanos, los cuales estudian en la universidad estatal. Esta es la cuarta vez que solicita crédito a Impro, debido a tales antecedentes se aprobó la solicitud de la prestataria.

loans.use: acquisition of a computer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buy a tent for his customers to eat under

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Improve the appearance of his restaurant

loans.name: Abasolo 2 Group

texts.es:
Madam Juanita, as everyone lovingly calls her in the community, is 43 years old and has three children. For the past 8 years she has worked selling ground chicken. In spite of how exhausting her job is and the little income it generates, this business is the sole monetary support for her family. She would like to use her loan to obtain more chickens, a weight, and a glass window to display her products. The other members of the groups -- Albina G. and Maria P. -- run a grocery store. Maribel P. sells fruits and vegetables.

Translated from Spanish by Geoff Rubin, Kiva volunteer

DOÑA JUANITA COMO CARIÑOSAMENTE LA LLAMAN EN LA COMUNIDAD TIENE 43 AÑOS Y TRES HIJOS, DESDE HACE 8 AÑOS SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE POLLO TROZADO, A PESAR DE LO CANSADOR QUE RESULTA SU TRABAJO Y LA POCA GANANCIA QUE ESTO LE GENERA ESTE HA SIDO EL SUSTENTO DE SU FAMILIA, DESEA SU CREDITO PARA PODER OBTENER MAS POLLOS, UNA PESA Y HASTA UNA VITRINA PARA LA MEJJOR EXHIBICION DE SUS PRODUCTOS , LAS OTRAS INTEGRANTES DEL GRUPO ALBINA G. Y MARIA PÉREZ TIENEN UNA TIENDA DE ABARROTES, MARIBEL PÉREZ VENDE FRUTAS Y VERDURAS

loans.use: To buy more chickens, a weight, and a display cabinet

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buy more merchandise and set up an in-home store

loans.name: Miriam Del Carmen

texts.es:
Miriam is a 26-year-old single mother of two children, who are 4 and 8 years of age. From a young age, she had been working as a street vendor selling cosmetics. However, three years ago, with her mother’s financial support, she was able to set up her small home business, in which she sells a variety of products such as undergarments, purses, clothing for men and women, shoes, and perfume. She works from home in order to be close to her children and look after them.

She is an experienced woman who has managed to help her children get ahead in life. This business is her sole source of income, with which she has been able to cover the family expenses. Because her clientele has increased, she would like to repair her humble home since she has not been able to do so with her earnings. Her main priority is providing food and an education for her children with her revenue. At this time, she needs a loan in order to purchase the merchandise that her customers have ordered.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

Miriam tiene 26 años, es madre soltera de 2 hijos de 4 y 8 años de edad, desde muy joven trabajó de manera ambulante vendiendo cosméticos, fue hace 3 años que con el apoyo económico de su madre pudo lograr montar su pequeño negocio en su casa de habitación, en donde comercializa una variedad de productos como ropa interior, cartera, ropa para caballeros y damas, calzado y perfumes, todo esto con el objetivo de estar cerca de sus hijos y cuidar de ellos.

Es una microempresaria empírica que ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos, su negocio es la única entrada de ingresos con que cuenta esta madre y con la que ha podido cubrir todos los gastos familiares. Con el desarrollo y crecimiento de clientes que está teniendo la señora, desea mejorarle la condición habitacional en la que se encuentra actualmente su vivienda, ya que los ingresos que genera el negocio no le ha permitido acondicionar adecuadamente su humilde vivienda, ya que prioriza la alimentación y educación de sus hijos. En estos momentos, la señora necesita un préstamo para comprar mercadería solicitadas por sus clientes

loans.use: Purchase of shoes and apparel

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase more products for her store

loans.name: Maria Hortencia

texts.es:
Mrs. Maria B. is a 45-year-old married mother of 4 children, whom she must support. They live in the Villa Reconciliación area, which lacks some basic services such as potable water.

Thirteen years ago, she set up a small general store, which has been able to cover certain family expenses, in her humble house. Her husband does not have a steady job due to the lack of job opportunities. He sells medicine informally in communities far from the district of Managua, where people do not have access to pharmacies.

At home, they have a small but well-stocked inventory of medication that is consumed on a daily basis. At this time, Mrs. B. is requesting a loan in order to buy goods for her general store.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Maria tiene 45 años de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos a los cuales debe de alimentar, habitan en el asentamiento Villa Reconciliación, con carencia de algunos servicios básicos como el agua potable.

Hace 13 años, la señora monto una pequeña pulpería en su humilde vivienda con la cual ha podido subsanar ciertos gastos familiares, el esposo de la señora no cuenta con un trabajo fijo, debido a la falta de oportunidades de empleo, el señor vende medicamentos de manera informal en comunidades lejanas del departamento de Managua, en donde no tienen acceso a farmacias.

En la casa de habitación, cuenta con un inventario mínimo pero bien surtido de medicamentos comunes que son consumidos muy cotidianamente. En este momento la señora solicita un préstamo para comprar productos alimenticios para su pulpería.

loans.use: Purchase of milk, chicken, meat, eggs, beans, and sugar

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Invest in more merchandise and rice

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Invest in more merchandise for her store

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es:
Beatriz is a happy lady who learned to be independent thanks to the income she perceived for each of the activities she has worked in. In contemplating a good investment for her savings, she decided to accommodate a small store in her house to sell groceries and sodas. The profits of this store help satisfy her personal needs and those of her beloved children. Her partner, because of his work, can only live with her family monthly. Beatriz has learned how to understand and handle this situation, however, the family needs are growing, and she wants to satisfy them. This is why she sees in you an important possibility of support. Her objective is to increase the quality of service by offering a larger variety of products in her small selling space.

Translated to English by Patricia Yáñez, Kiva volunteer.

Beatriz, es una alegre dama que aprendió a ser independiente gracias a los ingresos que percibía por cada una de las catividades que desempeñaba. Contemplando una buena inversión de sus ahorros decidió instalar en su casa una pequeña tiendita de venta de abarrotes y bebidas que le ayuda a satisfacer sus necesidades personales y la de sus queridos hijos.Su pareja por razones laborales solo puede convivir con su familia mensualmente situación que Beatriz a sabido comprender y manejar, sin embargo las necesidades insatisfechas van en aumento y desea satisfacerlas y para ello ha visto en usted una importante posibilidad de apoyo con el objetivo de incrementar la calidad de su servicio ofreciendo mayor variedad de productos en su pequeño espacio.

loans.use: To increase the capital needed to acquire a larger quantity of first need articles with the purpose of bettering her services promptly.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
Yolanda is a prosperous entrepreneur due to her performance managing her businesses. She administers a small grocery shop out of her home and at the same time she sells "salchipapas" (a combination dish of sausages and potatoes)in the afternoon with her daughters. She had her husband had spent most of their time starting their grocery store and making it successful and without a doubt all hard work has its reward. Thanks to their hard work Yolanda can work selling salchipapas, which has become a great help in covering her children's expenses because they are pursuing higher education in the hope of developing and getting professional training. She is asking us to support her with a loan so that she can by photocopier that she will install in her store and provide photocopying services to her community. She hopes that you will work with and support her.

Translated from Spanish by a Kiva Translator.

Yolanda, es una próspera empresaria por su gran desempeño en sus negocios, puesto que administra una bodega en su casa y se dedica de igual manera a la venta de salchipapas por las tardes en compañía de sus hijas.Ella y su esposo han dado lo mejor de sus tiempos para establecer y hacer sostenible su negocio de abarrotes y sin en duda todo esfuerzo tiene su recompensa y gracias a esto ahora puede Yolanda dedicarse a la venta de salchipapas actividad diaria que se ha convertido en una gran ayuda para solventar los gastos de sus hijos quienes cursan estudios superiores con el deseo de poder desarrollarse y formarse profesionalmente.Solicita le apoyemos con el préstamo de una suma de dinero para comprase una fotocopiadora y poder instalarla en su bodega y ponerlo al servicio de su comunidad. Ella espera por vuestra colaboración y apoyo no lo olvides.

loans.use: Buy a photocopier.

loans.name: Mirtha

texts.es:
Mirtha is a cook with good tasting food. That is what her most zealous lodgers said. Everyday they attend her cozy dining room to sample the succulent dishes that she prepares. She has been selling food for two years in order to help her dear husband with the household expenses and the education of their two small children which want an opportunity to improve themselves and be able to acquire a good, solid education. Being this goal a great need and wish of this family, they are requesting a loan to set their place and build a small grocery store where the lodgers can get diverse consumer products. Remember that your support is important for the well-being of this family

Translated from Spanish by Maria Ramirez-Gregg, Kiva Volunteer

Mirtha, es cocinera con muy buena sazón, así lo confirman sus más fervientes pensionistas que día a día acuden a su acogedor comedor a degustar D. sus apetecibles platillos.Ella desD. hace dos años venD. comida para poder ayudar a su querido esposo con los gastos del hogar y la educación D. sus dos pequeños hijos, los cuales tienen deseos D. superación y gran necesidad D. poder formarse cognitivamente.Siendo esta una gran necesidad y deseo D. su familia requiere D. un préstamo para ambientar su local e instalar una bodeguita en donD. sus pensionistas puedan adquirir diversos productos D. consumo.Recuerda que su apoyo es importante para el bienestar D. esta familia.

loans.use: Buying better utensils to improve the service to her customers and their comfort.

loans.name: Edward

texts.es:
Edward, despite the circumstances he has had to live, with the abandonment of his wife, who left without any explanation leaving him behind with his children and without caring about the need they would have for her, has been able to move forward and today, with his daily hard work in his electronic repair shop he pays for the bills of his home. There, he counts with the help of his mother who aids in raising his children. She has been a great support in pushing him to expand his shop. Edward is looking for a loan to acquire tools that can help optimize every one of his clients’ requests.

Translated from Spanish by Wendy, Kiva Volunteer

Edward a pesar de las circunstancias que le ha tocado vivir, con el abandono de su esposa, quien se marchó sin ninguna explicación dejándolo solo con sus hijos sin importarle la falta que les haría.Pese a estas dificultades y la enorme tristeza que aún lo consume ha podido salir adelante y hoy con su desempeño diario en su taller eléctrico solventa los gastos en casa contando con la importante ayuda de su querida madre que le ayuda a criar a sus niños y quien ha sido un gran motor para la consolidación de su taller. Solicita un préstamo para mejorar sus instalaciones de servicio y para adquirir herramientas que le ayuden a optimizar cada una de las peticiones de sus clientes.

loans.use: Mejoramiento de las instalaciones del taller eléctrico y compra de herramientas.  Improving his electronic repair shop facilities and purchasing tools.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es:
Miriam has always distinguish herself as a good business owner at her brake shop located in the city of La Merced. Thanks to her responsibility and her performance, she and her family have been able to open a repair shop and spare parts garage at their home. The great demand that exists at her town for this service has given her the opportunity to increase her income but to be able to fulfill that she will need a bigger quantiy of products and spare parts brands that she orders from the capital. She hopes that she can count with your help to increase her investment capital and the daily support of her family, if you can help her, please don't hesitate and donate to help her

Translated from Spanish by Maria Ramirez-Gregg, Kiva Volunteer

Miriam, siempre se ha caracterizado por desempeñarse adecuadamente en su negocio D. venta D. frenos, en la ciudad D. la Merced, gracias a su responsabilidad y desempeño; ella y su familia han podido abrir un pequeño local y taller D. repuestos en su casa.La gran demanda que hay en la ciudad le ha otorgado la oportunidad D. incrementar sus ingresos pero para ello requiere D. mayor cantidad D. productos y marcas D. repuestos que demanda desD. la ciudad capital D. su país.Una D. sus esperanzas es poder contar con vuestra ayuda para incrementar su capital D. inversión y solicita una suma D. dinero que le ayudará ha adquirir su mercadería D. la cual depenD. su negocio y el sustento diario D. su familia, si usted pueD. ayudar no lo duD..

loans.use: Increasing capital to acquire a larger quantity of spare parts from the different car manufacturers in order to service most of the cars that drive around town on a daily basis.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es:
Dolores, like every woman, has goals and projects she wishes to fulfill, and hers is to be able to amplify her fuel sales business, by offering car washing service. However, this project might not be possible due to the lack of capital she faces and your support could be a determining factor for her being that she requires a sum of money to invest in the purchase of machinery needed for her car washing service. At the same time, this would allow her to make money to invest in her 2 children’s education and the expansion of her small business.

Translated from Spanish by Wendy, Kiva Volunteer

Dolores tiene como toda mujer anhelos y proyectos y el suyo es poder ampliar su negocio de venta de combustibles y brindar otros servicios como el lavado de autos, actividad muy rentable en la zona donde radica.Pero este proyecto podría no ser realizable por el escaso capital con el que cuenta y su apoyo podría ser determinante para Dolores, puesto que requiere de una suma de dinero para invertirlos en la compra de máquinas necesarias para el lavado de autos y empezar a aumentar sus ingresos e invertirlos en la educación de sus 2 hijos y en la consolidación de su pequeño negocio.

loans.use: Compra de máquinas necesarias para empezar a ofrecer un nuevo servicio. <b>Purchase of machines needed to begin to offer a new service.<b>

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.es:
Even though Sra. Marcelina is 60 years old, she still preserves the necessary energy to work and more, to look after a small child who was abandoned by his parents. This noble woman welcomed him into her home and now he has become more than a son to her. This child is the motor that impulses her to continue working and to dedicate herself to service the people that come to her pantry. She is conscious that at her age she has to deal with some discomforts and ailments but when she stops doing labor intense activities those discomforts and ailments will decrease.

That is the reason why she is seeking your help. She wants to be able to obtain the necessary money amount to supply her small shop with a larger quantity and better quality of products to sell to her customers. Remember that one person that helps others, sometimes needs to be helped as well.

Translated from Spanish by Maria Ramirez-Gregg, Kiva Volunteer

MARCELINA, a sus 60 años de edad aún conserva las fuerzas necesarias para trabajar y es más para velar por un pequeño niño, a quien sus padres lo abandonaron y esta noble mujer acogió en su hogar y ahora es más que un hijo para ella.Este niño es el motor que la impulsa a seguir trabajando y a dedicarse a prestar servicios en su bodega. Ella es consciente de que a su edad tiene que soportar algunos malestares y dolencias pero que al dejar de realizar actividades pesadas estas disminuirían. Por ese motivo recurre en búsqueda de tu ayuda a fin de obtener la cantidad de dinero necesaria para abastecer con mayor cantidad y mejor calidad de productos su pequeño espacio de ventas.Recuerde que una persona que ayuda, también tiene la necesidad de ser ayudada.

loans.use: Capital boost to acquire a larger quantity of basic needs items to offer at Marcelina's small pantry.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia has been involved in the sale of fuel for the past three years. She tells us that her motivation for starting this profitable business was a serious accident suffered by her dear husband when he was hit by a car driving full-speed down their street. After partially overcoming this hardship, they decided to go into business selling fuels. This has provided them a moderate level of income to help cover their basic household needs. Nevertheless, they are in need of some work tools and used materials to better meet the needs of their customers and increase their earnings. They are therefore seeking a loan.

Translated from Spanish by Leo Duran, Kiva Volunteer

Sonia, se dedica a la venta de combustibles, actividad que desempeña hace tres años y nos cuenta que lo que la impulsó a incursionar en este rentable negocio fue el grave accidente que sufrió su querido esposo a consecuencia de una auto que se desplazaba a toda velocidad por calle próxima a su domicilio.Al superar este hecho parcialmente incursionaron en el negocio de venta de combustibles que les otorga hasta hoy unos ingresos módicos para satisfacer las necesidades básicas de su hogar.Sin embargo requieren de algunas herramientas de trabajo y materiales de uso, para propiciar una atención adecuada y eficaz a sus clientes y mejorar sus ingresos económicos, asunto por el que solicita un préstamo.

loans.use: Increase capital to purchase work tools for better fuel distribution

loans.name: Amelia

texts.es:
Amelia is the noble mother of a family that works in agriculture, as is typical in the area. She has invested 100% of her capital and wealth in this endeavor. Early every morning one can see how Amelia cares for her children and departs for her fields. She gives the fields the care and treatment necessary to produce high yields and to increase the quality of her income from the harvest. Amelia has clear goals, not so much for her personal satisfaction but in order to assist her children, upon whom she has focused her goals and desires. She is asking for our help raising money in order to purchase fertilizers and manure for her fields. This will make them more productive.

Translated from Spanish by Debra Faszer-McMahon, Kiva Volunteer.

Amelia, es una noble madre de familia que como es típico en la zona, está dedicada a las labores agrícolas en el que ha invertido el 100% de su capital y su patrimonio.Todos los días muy de mañana podríamos ver como Amelia atiende a sus niños y sale rumbo a sus chacras para darles el cuidado y tratamiento necesario para que puedan producir en cantidad y mejorar la calidad y sus ingresos en la cosecha.Claro como toda familia con metas claras no tanto para su satisfacción personal sino la superación de sus hijos en quienes ha enfocado sus metas y deseos solicita la podamos ayudar con la suma de dinero que solicita para la compra de fertilizantes y abonos para sus tierras a fin hacerlas más productivas.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
Nancy is dedicated to the storage and care of fruit. She picks fruits that are then transported to the city of Santa Ana, Peru, and to the capital of her country. This work is very important and valuable because the act of selection also leads into the ripening process. Good picking helps to maintain the quality of the fruit and keep it tasty. Because this job takes great strength, it is very labor intensive, but it is also very costly due to the need to purchase boxes that will hold a large quantity of harvested fruit. For this reason the few boxes that Nancy owns are a great limitation. Nancy hopes to count on your collaboration in order to increase her production. She needs a loan that she will invest exclusively in the purchase of boxes and other materials to facilitate the transport of fruit.

Translated from Spanish by Debra Faszer-McMahon, Kiva Volunteer.

Nancy, se dedica al depósito de frutas para seleccionarlas y ser luego trasportadas a las ciudad de Santa Ana y a la capital de su país. Este trabajo es muy importante y valioso porque al realizar la selección también se cumple el trabajo de maduración de los productos, esta actividad ayuda a mantenerlos bien cuidados y sobre todo muy apetitosos..Debido a que demanda mucho esfuerzo, esta labor es muy pesada pero también costosa por la compra de cajones para introducir en ellas la gran cantidad de frutas que cosechan, por esa razón los pocos cajones con los que cuenta es una gran limitación.Ella desea poder contar con su colaboración y lograr aumentar su producción para ello requiere de un préstamo que invertirá exclusivamente en la compra de cajones y demás materiales para facilitar sus traslado.

loans.use: To purchase a greater quanitity of boxes in order to facilitate the transport of fruit.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos is a man of many talents. Besides being a craftsman (the field that he has been focused on the longest), he also works as a brick-layer and creates sustainable projects for his community. Thanks to his abilities he has a handmade crafts stand, and now he dreams of starting a gastronomic business. He would like to offer well-known rainforest dishes as well as give visitors the best attention and experience with exotic foods and drinks from his native community. In order to realize this dream he needs a sum of money with which to begin the work. He does not have the start-up funds and is asking us to help facilitate his dream by providing the required amount. He hopes to count on your support.

Translated from Spanish by Debra Faszer-McMahon, Kiva Volunteer.

Carlos, es un hombre con mil oficios, porque aparte de ser artesano, labor en el que se desempeña por más tiempo, también presta sus servicios como albañil y elabora proyectos sostenibles en su comunidad.Gracias a su potencial tiene un puesto de productos artesanales y ahora anhela poner un negocio gastronómico en el cual podría difundir los famosos platos de la selva y de igual manera dar a los visitantes la mejor atención y degustación de platos y bebidas exóticas de su comunidad nativa.Para ello tendría que tener una suma de dinero con el cual empezará a trabajar, este dinero precisamente es con el que no cuenta y pide le podamos facilitar la cantidad requerida para su anhelado proyecto.Esperamos contar con vuestra colaboración.

loans.use: Injection of capital in order to begin a gastronomic project

loans.name: Yohana

texts.es:
Yohana has had to overcome innumerable challenges in her life. First, she was abandoned by her fiancé, and then her young child became ill. Her son suffers from mental retardation as a consequence of a vaccine that he was given in the heel. This occurred at Pichanaki hospital in Peru. As a consequence, the child did not develop well during his first few years, and today he still has complications that keep him from speaking and developing like other children his age. Yohana struggles every day to work in her papaya and citric fruit fields in order to pay for her son’s costly treatments at the San Juan de Dios hospital in the city of Lima, Peru. She and her ex-fiancé struggle to cover the costs of treatments and hospital visits. However, she looks to you as a support in order to continue helping her son. She is asking for money in order to invest in her fruit fields. You can help her child indirectly by supporting his mother. Don’t doubt that he needs your assistance.

Translated from Spanish by Debra Faszer-McMahon, Kiva Volunteer.

Yohana a pesar del sin numero de situaciones críticas que tuvo que superar luego del abandono de su primer compromiso y la enfermedad de su pequeño hijo, quien padece de retardo mental a consecuencia de una vacuna que le inyectaron en el talón, en el hospital de Pichanaki, a consecuencia de este hecho este niño no se ha desarrollado bien a sus primeros años y hoy tiene complicaciones para poder hablar y desenvolverse como cualquier niño de su edad.Ella lucha día a día trabajando en su chacra de frutas de papayas y cítricos para poder pagar el costoso tratamiento de su niño en el hospital San Juan de Dios en la ciudad de Lima y cuyos gastos afronta, luego de tantas visitas, con su ex pareja.Sin embargo ve en usted una ayuda y apoyo para poder seguir ayudando a su hijo y solicita una suma de dinero para invertirlos en sus terrenos de cultivo. Usted puede ayudar indirectamente a este niño a través de su madre no lo dude él nos necesita.

loans.use: Injection of capital to increase the number of products planted and harvested

loans.name: Juaquina

texts.es:
Juaquina is a brave mother who has struggled to gain respect and rights for her dear daughter. Juaquina’s child was born with a physical limitation that left her unable to communicate like the other members of the family. In spite of this, Juaquina’s daughter has been able to attend school and to receive an education thanks to the bravery and strong character of her mother. Juaquina has for many years confronted the authorities and demanded an inclusive rather than discriminatory education for her child. Juaquina is not only brave but also hard-working and dedicated to her grocery business. This activity has helped her to cover the expenses of her three children. However, all of this hard work could be in vain if her business were to decline. In order to avoid any such calamity, Juaquina is asking for a loan in order to consolidate her product and acquire larger quantities of articles for her small store. With your contribution she will be able to reach her goals. She awaits the help of someone like you.

Translated from Spanish by Debra Faszer-McMahon, Kiva Volunteer.

Juaquina, es una valiente madre que ha sabido luchado por el cumplimiento y respeto de los derechos de su querida hija que nació con una limitación física ya que no puede comunicarse como el resto de los miembros de su hogar, a pesar de este hecho dejo de asistir a una escuela y a recibir educación y todo ello gracias a la entereza y valentía de su madre, quien por largos se ha enfrentado a las autoridades y ha exigido una educación inclusiva y no discriminatoria.Ella no sólo es valiente sino trabajadora y dedicada al negocio de venta de abarrote, esta actividad la ha ayudado a solventar los gastos de sus tres hijos.Pero esto podría ser truncado por el decaimiento de su negocio con el fin de evitar este acontecimiento solicita un préstamo a fin de consolidar y adquirir mayor cantidad de artículos para su pequeña tiendita.Con su contribución podrá logralo solo espera por la ayuda de personas como usted.

loans.use: To increase capital in order to purchase a larger quantity of necessary products.

loans.name: Leandro

texts.es:
Leandro is a courageous man who at his advanced age still maintains the vigor and strength to go out and work every morning in his citric fields. He fulfills every aspect of his job with the same intensity that he had when he was young. Without a doubt, the cultivation of fruit is his passion and it gives him life. Now, however, he is worried about the ill health that has begun to plague his dear wife. She has begun to have the sharp and anguished pains associated with her age. Leandro’s greatest motivation is now the desire to earn a better income in order to purchase medicines and vitamins for his beloved wife. Let’s help him with his request for a loan in order to purchase more seeds and fertilizer. His goal is to increase his production and earnings in order to improve his wife’s health.

Translated from Spanish by Debra Faszer-McMahon, Kiva Volunteer.

Leandro, es un valeroso hombre que a su edad aún mantiene vigor y fuerza para salir a trabajar todas las mañanas a su chacra de cítricos su desempeño en cada una de sus actividades las realiza con la misma intensidad de cuando era aún joven, sin duda el cultivo de frutas es lo que lo apasiona y le da vida.Pero ahora está preocupado por los malestares que manifiesta su querida esposa quien ha empezado a tener dolores muy agudos y angustiantes propios de su edad.El deseo de obtener mayores ingresos para adquirir medicinas y vitaminas para la recuperación de su adorada compañera son el motivo más grande que tiene para su diario esfuerzo.Posibilitemos su petición de un préstamo para adquirir mayor cantidad de semillas y abonos con el objetivo de la consolidación de su actividad para mejorar la salud de su esposa.

loans.use: To purchase a larger quantity of seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: María

texts.es:
Maria is a 55 year old woman who works very hard in the farm and in her neighborhood store with the help of her husband. They both take turns in attending the business in order to take care of this important source of income. This allows them to reduce their stress, but they are starting to feel some of the common pains of aging. This has maD. them rethink their situation and they have decided that they would like to strengthen their business so that they no longer need to work on the field. That is why they have asked for a loan that will help them achieve their goal so that they can stay with their business and proviD. a better service to all their clients.

Translated from Spanish by Samantha, Kiva Volunteer.

Maria a sus 55 años, trabaja muy duramente en la chacra y en su bodega en compañía D. su esposo, con quien ha establecido turnos D. trabajo para no descuidar esta importante fuente D. ingreso familiar, este ritmo les ayuda a evitar estrés, pero lo que si no han podido evitar son algunas dolencias propias D. su edad.Estos padecimientos los ha hecho reflexionar y plantearse la meta D. consolidar su pequeño centro D. ventas para evitar las duras horas D. trabajo en el campo. Por esa razón su propósito es obtener un préstamo que les permita cristalizar este deseo a fin D. pronto permanecer en este lugar brindando una mejora atención y mayores comodidades a cada uno D. sus clientes.

loans.use: To increase their capital in order to strengthen their business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Continue investing in more merchandise

loans.name: Senobia

texts.es:
Senobia owns a small store. The town she lives in is far from the city, so her store has been a very big help in the community, as her neighbors need basic food products daily. For two years she has been able to satisfy her customers' needs, but as their needs change and grow, she's worried she won't be able to keep up with the demand. As a result, she has invested in a yuca crop which she hopes will bring in enough capital to grow her business. As she watches over her yuca crop, she also works at her store. Let's help her make her wish a reality.

Translated by Beatriz Yuste, Kiva Volunteer.

Doña Senobia, posee una pequeña bodega dentro de su comunidad que ha sido de gran ayuda para sus vecinos quienes se encuentran alejados de la ciudad y requieren de alimentos de primera necesidad diariamente.Ella a lo largo de 2 años ha podido abastecer a sus vecinos pero cada vez es más preocupante este hecho debido a que las necesidades de sus queridos clientes van en aumento; razón por la cual ha invertido un gran capital de dinero en el cultivo de yuca que espera le pueda dejar buenas ganancias para incrementar y fortalecer su negocio; mientras aguarda la cosecha trabaja en su bodega.Posibilitemos su petición para que pronto este deseo pueda convertirse en realidad.

loans.use:
To buy more quantity and variety of basic foods for her small store.
.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.es:
Since she was young, Marcela has always enjoyed maintaining herself presentable. This characteristic motivated her to become an active member of the most popular brands and beauty lines in the country. Thanks to the large amount of orders and a large portfolio of clients, she has been able to form partnerships with some stores who now carry her products. She also has her cosmetic products on display at home for her clients. For 5 years she has had big returns, but now she finds herself in a different situation that she must overcome and we confiD. in you to offer her a helping hand. She's asking for a loan to buy a greater quantity of products so she can strengthen her business. Let's answer her petition for a loan so she can make this a reality and free herself from the problems that surround this mother.

Translated by Beatriz Yuste, Kiva Volunteer.

A Doña Marcela, desD. joven le ha agradado mantenerse muy presentable, caracteristica que la motivaron a ser miembro activo D. las más populares marcas y líneas D. belleza D. su país, gracias a la gran cantidad D. pedidos y a la gran cartera D. clientas que maneja a podido formar alianzas con algunas tiendas en las que oferta sus productos y no tan solo eso sino que en su domicilio tiene un pequeño mostrador con diversos productos cosméticos.Ella hace mas D. 5 años ha tenido grandes beneficios, pero ahora se ve en algunos problemas que tendrá que superar y confiamos en usted para tenderle una mano, ella solicita un préstamo para adquirir mayor cantidad D. productos con el objetivo D. estabilizar su negocio.Posibilitemos su petición para que pronto este hecho se haga realidad y libre las dificultades en las que ha estado inmersa esta trabajadora madre.

loans.use: Increase capital to buy more cosmetics.

loans.name: Neli

texts.es:
Neli is a very dedicated mother of a family, and it is her wish to be able to provide them with the best so they can fulfill all of their needs. She therefore decided 4 years ago to devote herself to agriculture. She inherited the land from her parents with the purpose of maintaining its upkeep. She plants all types of crops in these fields, such as vegetables, tubers and gladioli, and sells them directly to customers. She stays motivated during her long workdays by focusing on her commitment to providing her 3-year-old young daughter with a quality education. In order to continue working toward her goal, she is seeking a monetary loan to invest in the purchase of a greater quantity of seeds, manure and fertilizers.

Translated from Spanish by Leo Duran, Kiva Volunteer

Neli, es una madre de familia muy dedicada y su deseo es poder ofrecer a su familia lo mejor, a fin de que puedan satisfacer todas sus necesidades.Por esta razón ha decidido dedicarse a la agricultura hace 4 años ya que sus padres le heredaron las tierras que le corresponden con el objetivo de que pueda obtener sustento de ellas, en éstas parcelas siembra todo tipo de cultivo como verduras, tubérculos y también gladiolos los cuales comercializa directamente a sus clientes.Las intensas jornadas de trabajo son motivados por el compromiso de otorgarle una educación de calidad a su pequeña hija de 3 años. Para seguir trabajando con el noble propósito de alcanzar lo que se ha propuesto solicita un préstamo de dinero para invertirlos en la compra de mayor cantidad de semillas, abonos y fertilizantes.

loans.use: Purchase of seeds, manure and fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Buy merchandise from wholesalers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Invest in more cosmetics and possibly home appliances

loans.name: Benjamín

texts.es:
Benjamin is a committed family man. His high sense of responsibility motivates him to work hard every day in the fields. He also finds the time to be an active member of the community. He owns crop fields where he primarily plants corn and peas in the high elevations of his city. His desire to improve the quality of life of his family has led him to become involved in many community activities, and he is therefore well-known among its residents. He is seeking a loan with the desire to increase his financial earnings and invest them in the purchase of improved seeds, manure and fertilizers for the next sowing season. Your help will be very important in the achievement of this active family man's goals.

Translated from Spanish by Leo Duran, Kiva Volunteer

Benjamín, es un padre de familia comprometido, su alto sentido de responsabilidad lo impulsa cada día a dedicarse en las duras tareas del campo y es así que su actividad diaria las comparte con su compromiso como participante activo de su comunidad.Cuenta con campos de cultivo en los que siembra predominantemente maíz y arvejas en las alturas de su ciudad. El deseo de mejorar la calidad de vida de los miembros de su hogar lo han conducido a involucrarse en muchas actividades comunales y por esta razón es muy reconocido entre sus miembros.Con el deseo de incrementar sus ingresos económicos solicita un préstamo para invertirlos en la compra de semillas mejoradas, abonos y fertilizantes para esta próxima siembra.Tu ayuda es muy importante para la cristalización de los deseos de este activo padre de familia.

loans.use: Purchase of manure, fertilizers and better seeds

loans.name: Renee

texts.es:
Renee has always dedicated herself to agricultural labors, those that provide for the daily sustenance of her family. She is a young mother of a family and has always fought to move forward. After having committed herself for a short period to commercial activities, for the past four years Renee has worked more intensively in the country. The greater proportion of the vegetables she sows are lettuce and little Chinese onions. The harvest is the time at which the most help is needed because the work to be done is even more difficult. Washing the little Chinese onions must be done carefully and with attention to detail in order for the best possible presentation of the product and it is for this reason that Renee finds herself completing the task with such vigilance. She desires to have her own commercial establishment or a storeroom in her own home that will allow her to have more time to attend to her two small children, and in order to move forward with her efforts, Renee is asking for a loan that will allow her to strengthen her agricultural activities. Your support plays a very important role in the realization of this goal.

Translated from Spanish to English by Laura Kirkvold, Kiva volunteer.

Renee, siempre se ha dedicado a las labores agrícolas las cuales proveen el sustento diario a su familia, ella es una joven madre de familia que siempre ha luchado para salir adelante después de haberse dedicado por un corto período a las actividades comerciales, desde hace cuatro años labora con mayor intensidad en el campo, siembra en mayor proporción verduras tales como la lechuga y la cebollita china en épocas de cosecha es cuando mayor ayuda necesita porque las tareas que realiza son aún más duras, el lavado de la cebollita China debe hacerse con detalle para la buena presentación del producto y es por eso que Renee ahora se encuentra realizando un trabajo muy diligente. Su anhelo es tener un establecimiento comercial o una bodega en su propia casa que le permita tener más tiempo para atender a sus dos pequeños y para continuar con estos esfuerzos Renee solicita un préstamo que le permitirá el fortalecimiento de sus actividades agrícolas.Vuestro apoyo es muy importante para la cristalización de este deseo.

loans.use: Injection of capital for the strengthening of the agricultural activities of Renee and her family.

loans.name: Joel

texts.es:
Joel, as the father figure of the family, has always looked out for the best interests of his family. His life companion helps him and continually encourages him to strive for progress. On a daily basis he works in transport, offering his services to members of his community. He takes them from one place to another, in a vehicle that his mother left to him so that it could be a means of employment and sustenance of his family. In addition to his business, his wife also contributes to the household through her shoe business. Joel and his wife, together, have both worked very hard over the past 7 years. However, the income from their work have been decreasing recently because Joel's back pains have intensified. For this reason they are asking for a loan in order to increase the number and quality of products offered in Isabel’s small sales stand so that Joel can remain for some time in treatment to alleviate his terrible pain and help out in her business part-time. Joel is asking for the help from your generous hearts.

Translated from Spanish to English by Laura Kirkvold, Kiva volunteer.

Joel, es un padre de familia que siempre ha buscado lo mejor para su familia, con ayuda de su compañera de toda la vida que lo acompaña y alienta continuamente para alcanzar el progreso, es así que diariamente él se dedica al transporte ofreciendo sus servicios a los miembros de su comunidad de un lugar a otro en la movilidad que su madre le cedió para que éste sea su instrumento de trabajo y sea el sustento diario de su familia.De manera adicional para contribuir con el bienestar de su hogar su esposa se dedica al comercio de calzados, esta forma de vida y de esfuerzo constante tiene 7 años de existencia, sin embargo todas las ganas de trabajo de esta pareja ha ido mermando conforme las dolencias de columna de este querido padre de familia se han intensificado. Por esa razón hace la solicitud de un préstamo con el propósito de implementar con mayor y mejor calidad de productos el pequeño espacio de ventas de su esposa Isabel a fin de permanecer un tiempo en tratamiento para aliviarse de los terribles dolores e incorporarse a su labor en corto tiempo. Joel solicita la ayuda de vuestros generosos corazones para que su que´rida familia con el esfuerzo de su esposa Isabel permanezca bien y muy unida mientras se recupere y recobre su salud.

loans.use: Purchase a greater variety and quantity of products for Isabel's (Joel's wife) small sales stand.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es:
Beatriz is from Raquina and for her entire life she has been involved in agricultural work. She is of the mentality that work requiring a great deal of effort brings her the most satisfaction. She has always sought to reap the best possible results from her crops and has cared for her animals in order to profit and be able to provide for her 6 children. In addition to growing corn and peas, Beatriz raises sheep, cows, pigs, hens, and guinea pigs. On a daily basis, she puts forth all of her effort and patience in order to care for them and make sure that they remain healthy and strong for sales and consumption. For the next sowing season, she is asking for a loan in order to be able to increase her production and in order to gain greater earnings that will allow her to contribute more to the dreams of success of her dear children.

Translated from Spanish to English by Laura Kirkvold, Kiva volunteer.

Beatriz, es natural de Raquina y toda su vida ha estado ligada a las actividades agrícolas con la mentalidad de un trabajo de largo esfuerzo que ofrece satisfacción.Ella siempre ha luchado para asegurarse de que los resultados de su siembra y el cuidado de sus animales tengan un resultado muy provechoso para el sustento de sus 6 hijos, cultiva verduras, además de maíz y arveja y entre los animales que cría podemos observar a la oveja, a las vacas, a los cerditos, a las gallinas y a los cuyes, a diario despliega toda su fuerza y paciencia en su cuidado para mantenerlos sanos y fuertes para su posterior venta y/o consumo.Para esta próxima siembra solicita un préstamo a fin de incrementar los productos de siembra y obtener mayores ganancias que le permitan contribuir con el cumplimiento de los sueños de éxito de sus queridos hijos.

loans.use: Injection of capital in order to acquire a larger quantity of better seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase a dryer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Continue buying merchandise for her store

loans.name: Berenice's Group

texts.en:
Berenice B. M. is 33 years old and a mother of two children, who attend primary school. Jointly with other women of the El Carretón community of San Cristobal, she'll take a loan which they will invest in the purchase of clothing in bulk and silver jewelry to resell in the community. Berenice will operate her business predominantly from her house, but at times she will visit other women in the neighborhood to sell her products. The future entrepreneur says she is a responsible and trustworthy person, and that she will make great efforts to make her business successful. She also says she will encourage the other women to do the same.

NOTE: The members of the group warrant one another’s loans. If one of the women fails in repaying the loan, the other members will have to take the responsibility.

loans.use: To purchase clothing in bulk and silver jewelry

loans.name: Khin

texts.en: Mrs. Khin K., 49, works with her husband as gas sellers together earning $5.20 per day. They have 6 children. One of the elder daughters is a food seller (selling rice and food in front of her house to nearby customers) and earns about $3.30 per day. This couple wants to buy a plot of farmland to plant a variety of vegetables to gain more profit. This family would like a loan from KIVA that is $1000 to purchase farmland.

loans.use: This couple use this loan to purchase a plot of farmland to plant variety of vegetables.

loans.name: Yat

texts.en: Yat Y. is 25 years old, married, and the mother of two children. She and her husband (in the photo here) own a plot of land. Together they grow a variety of vegetables, and earn a total of $2 a day. Her husband, Ry Cha, is 33 years old and supplements the family profit by collecting recycled items from the community, earning a total of $5 a day. The couple would like a loan of $500 to increase the variety of vegetables and crops on Yat’s farmland, and use the rest of the money to support the family.

loans.use: Use this loan to purchase yam seed and keep as a capital to purchase recycle items.

loans.name: Daim

texts.en:
Mrs. Daim S. L., 58, is married with 2 children. She is a vendor of grocery products and earns around $2.50 in profit a day. Her husband Mr. Wa Neang, 56, works as a farmer and makes on average about $1 in profit a day . They have two daughters both of whom work in Phnom Penh City.

It seems not enough for daily expenses with their present income, so they need some capital to expand their business. They want to use the money to buy more grocery products to sell to get more profit. To purchase more products, they are requesting a loan from KIVA of $700.

loans.use: Purchase more grocery products for re-sale

loans.name: Im

texts.en: Mrs. Im K., 36, grows rice on her small plot of land and earns a $1 a day. Her husband Mr. Sam Kimsan, 38, works as a construction laborer and normally earns about $2.5 a day. They have 6 children, 3 of who are employed by a garment factory. Each month these three children send money to their family to pay for thier younger brothers education. They would like to purchase a plot of land to exapand thier crop and increase  their family income.

loans.use: Use this loan to purchase a plot of land to do farming.

loans.name: Komil

texts.ru:
Komil is not married. He works as a salesperson in a general store, where he sells goods and groceries. His father helped him start the business and also supplies Komil with goods. Currently Komil is applying for a loan to expand the store's inventory. The inventory mostly consists of groceries and after a long winter he wants to purchase fresh supplies.

Translated from Russian by Anya Lyuksyutova, Kiva volunteer

Комил не женат. Он работает в магазине продавцом. В его прилавке имеется товар, продукты питания. Его отец помог начать бизнес и он привозит товар. В настоящее время он кредитуется для увеличения ассортимента. Его товары Его товар в основном состоит из продуктов питания. После долгой зимы он планирует торговать новым ассортиментом.

loans.use: trade of food

loans.name: Hom

texts.en: Mrs. Hom C., 51, is the mother of 6 children. She is a housewife, who looks after her home and cooks for her family. Mrs. C. also works as a farmer growing a variety of vegetables in order to generate an income. She earns about $1 a day. Her husband, Mr. Yu Leng, works as a high school teacher, and makes an average of $3.50 a day. One of her childrean works in Phnom Penh City as a garment worker, and earns around $50 a month. With this loan, the couple hopes to purchase, breed, and resell pigs. They will use the money they earn to pay back their loan, and create a new business with their profit.

loans.use: Use this loan to purchase pigs to breed.

loans.name: Sadriddin

texts.ru:
Sadriddin D. is married and is the father of three children. Several years ago his brother opened a general store where only groceries are sold. Now that Sadriddin has married and bought an apartment, he also has decided to open his own business, since his brother and parents can no longer support him. Sadriddin is going to to sell alcoholic beverages as well as select food items, so as not to compete with his brother. He is planning to open a store near his brother's business.

Translated from Russian by Anya Lyuksyutova, Kiva volunteer

Садриддин имеет троих детей. Несколько лет назад его брат открыл магазин и продавал только продукты питания. И Садриддин решил также заняться бизнесом, так как он женился и купил квартиру, брат и родители уже не могли ему помогать. Его товар алкогольные напитки , а также некоторые продукты питания. Он планирует отделить свой товар и открыть свой магазин недалеко от магазина брата.

loans.use: Food Market

loans.name: Sevil

texts.en:
Ms. Sevil is a very low-income woman. She is 57, married, with seven children and lives in the village of Saatli town in the south-central flat area of Azerbaijan Republic in the Caucasus region.

Sevil owns a small herd of cattle. On Saturdays, she sells animals she breeds, and buys calves to breed them again. The business is going well but needs some improvements. Sevil plans to increase her number of calves to make her income higher. Her family expenditures are getting higher, as her children grow. Sevil has asked for a loan of $600, approved by Normicro Saatli branch. She hopes this credit will improve her family life.

loans.use: To buy calves

loans.name: Sevda

texts.en: Sevda is a 46-year-old local resident of Saatli town. She is married and lives with her husband and two children. She breeds cattle with her husband. They have been engaged in this business for 20 years. She raises calves and sells them alive to the local market or to butcheries. She also sells milk and other dairy products. Cattle breeding is traditional in this region side, where there are no other jobs. Sevda wants to increase the number of cows they own. She wants to buy two more calves to add to their livestock. She has applied to Normicro Saatli branch for a loan in amount of $600.

loans.use: To buy calves

loans.name: Teymur

texts.en: Mr. Teymur is a 36-year-old farmer, married, and a local resident of Saatli. He breeds cattle with his wife (she is shown in the picture). They have been engaged in this business for 10 years. He raises calves and sells them alive to the local market or to butcheries. He also sells milk and other dairy products. He wants to buy two more calves to add to their livestock. He is applying to Normicro Saatli branch for a loan in amount of $500.

loans.use: To buy calves

loans.name: Teymur

texts.en: Mr. Teymur is a 21-year-old married man. He is a farmer. He lives with his family in Saatli, situated in the central part of Azerbaijan. Teymur started his business in 1995, when he purchased one cow with money he had saved up. The work is hard but interesting and takes a lot of effort. Teymur purchases calves, breeds them, and cuts and sells them to the butcher, who works at the local big market. At the same time, the salary is not enough to cover all of Teymur’s family expenses. To increase the profit margin from the selling, Teymur has to invest some money to make his small herd bigger. This winter he applied for $500 to buy four calves. In a half a year their price could be twice as big. With a loan from KIVA lenders, he hopes eventually to expand his business.

loans.use: To buy calves

loans.name: Osimjon

texts.ru:
Osimjon M. is married and has three children. He manages a general food store, where he sells goods supplied to him by his friends. He rents the store space and, since during winter the trading was slow, he needs to take out a loan to purchase additional goods for his store.
